job.title: Junior Software Engineer, Full-Stack
job.description: pstrongAbout CharterUPbrbrstrongppWe aimnbspto be the leading charter bus platform in the world and are looking for talented and ambitious people that want to be along for the ride We are disrupting the massive and highly fragmented bus industry by using our proprietary technology to seamlessly connect bus companiesnbspto customers businesses nonprofits and governments By promoting group travel we can reduce the transportation industrys carbon footprint and help make our planet greener We are achieving success bynbspdelighting our people our customers and our bus partnersbrbrppstrongAbout This RolebrbrstrongppWe are looking to add a FullStack Software Engineer to the team You will be working with top notchtalent that includes both our internal team as well as some of the brightest contractors No member is an island At CharterUP you will be a part of a team with deep knowledge of all areas of software developmentbrbrppOur team embraces Agile methodologies and is quick to adapt We use a wide range of languages and tools Our latest products are finely crafted weblications that empower our users We are passionate about user experience And we are excited about showing up to code You can expect to be challenged You can expect your contributions to be accepted and appreciated And you can expect your skills to become even sharper Iron sharpens ironbrbrppWe are looking for someone who understands software architecture data modeling and objectoriented programming concepts You must be a coder We would love to see examples of interesting solutions youve createdbrbrppemCompensationbrbrempulli85000 base salaryliliMaterial equity awardliulpemWhat Youll DobrbrempulliEfficiently roll out technical features from concept to productliliCollaborate with a team to develop our next generation travel platformliliDevelop tooling and processes to benefit and grow our teamliulpemWhat Youll NeedbrbrempulliBachelors degree in Computer Science Computer Engineering or similar STEM degree from a topranked institutionliliBackend expertise in Java Spring Boot or HibernateliliFrontend expertise in Vue React or AngularliliPotential to quickly develop expertise in any part of our tech stack where you have limited experienceliulpemLocationbrbremppCharterUPs headquarters are in Atlanta but employees can work remotely fulltime or from one of CharterUPs satellite offices in New York City San Francisco or AustinbrbrppstrongTeam Application ProcessbrbrstrongpolliCandidate submits CharterUP online applicationulliResumes encouraged to be at most one page in lengthliliAnswers to allnbspinitial application questions thoroughly reviewedliulliliInitial evaluationulliCoding exerciseliliGeneral aptitude assessmentliliShort interview with executivesliulliliInterviewsulliLong dev team interview which includesnbspCTO and other engineersliliInformal conversation with junior engineersliulliliOfferulliBackground and reference checks prior to formal offerliulliolpstrongCharterUP PrinciplesbrbrstrongppAt CharterUP we dont compromise on quality We hire smart highenergy trustworthy people and keep them as motivated and happy as possible We do that by adhering to our principles which arebrbrpolliCustomer FirstulliWe always think about how our decisions will impact our clients earning and keeping customer trust is our top priorityliliWe are not afraid of shortterm pain for longterm customer benefitliulliliCreate an Environment for Exceptional PeopleulliWe foster intellectual curiosityliliWe identify top performers mentor them and empower them to achieveliliEvery hire and promotion will have a higher standardliulliliEveryone is an Entrepreneur  OwnerulliNo team member is defined by their function or job title no job is beneath anyoneliliWe do more with less we are scrappy and inventiveliliWe think longtermliulliliRelentlessly High StandardsulliWe dont winsliliWe dont compromise on qualityliulliliClarity amp SpeedulliWhen in doubt we act we can always change courseliliWe focus on the key drivers of a process that will deliver the most
